lines.english: There’s a little bit of breaking news to bring you
lines.irish: Tá beagán nuachta briste againn daoibh

lines.english: And that is that counter terrorism police will investigate the rap trio, Kneecap
lines.irish: Go ndéanfaidh póilíní frithsceimhlitheoireachta fiosrú ar an triúr rapálaithe, Kneecap

lines.english: Mothaíomse blessed
lines.irish: I feel blessed

lines.english: Le titim de do wreck
lines.irish: From falling from your wreck

lines.english: Le d'fhoireann chúltsráid
lines.irish: With your backstreet crew

lines.english: Táim sa tóir ar do réiteach
lines.irish: I’m chasing your solution

lines.english: An rialtas anois in bits
lines.irish: The government is in bits now

lines.english: Kneecap gave them a frisk
lines.irish: Kneecap searched them up

lines.english: Sporán le notaí
lines.irish: A wallet full of notes

lines.english: But we know they've got more than this
lines.irish: Ach tá a fhios againn go bhfuil níos mó acu ná sin

lines.english: Gréim láimhe and we'll stroll to the bank
lines.irish: A firm grip and we’ll stroll to the bank

lines.english: Gimme Kemi's money and give her my thanks
lines.irish: Tabhair dom airgead Kemi agus gabhaigí buíochas léi

lines.english: We'll call it reparations, Badenoch, ya wank
lines.irish: Glaofaimid é cúiteamh, Badenoch, amadán

lines.english: Tried to take my money but I came and collected it back
lines.irish: Rinne tú iarracht mo chuid airgid a thógáil ach thóg mé ar ais é

lines.english: Nah, nah, nah
lines.irish: Ná, ná, ná

lines.english: Imithe le fada
lines.irish: Gone a long time

lines.english: It's Kneecap, the recap; Ríthe Bhéal Feirste
lines.irish: Seo Kneecap, an achoimre; Kings of Belfast

lines.english: Ar chrónaigh sibh Provaí, Móglaí Bap agus Mo Chara
lines.irish: You crowned Provaí, Móglaí Bap and Mo Chara

lines.english: Kemi ya wally
lines.irish: Kemi, you eejit

lines.english: Tá an scríobhneacht ar na ballaí
lines.irish: The writing’s on the wall

lines.english: You like to think that you're fooling everybody
lines.irish: Ceapann tú go bhfuil tú ag cur gach duine i gcfiacha

lines.english: But you're not
lines.irish: Ach níl tú

lines.english: Just like the Iron Lady, your career is gonna rot
lines.irish: Cosúil leis an Mná Iarainn, beidh deireadh le do ghairm

lines.english: Tá d'am de chac imithe ar smacht
lines.irish: Your time of shite has gone out of control

lines.english: Kneecap ar ais anois, le rud a chur i gceart
lines.irish: Kneecap back now, to set things right

lines.english: Anseo a ndéantar raic, tá muid tinn de do chac
lines.irish: Here’s where chaos is made, we’re sick of your shite

lines.english: Kemi ya wally, tá Maggie ag coladh ina leaba
lines.irish: Kemi you eejit, Maggie is sleeping in her bed

lines.english: Is cuma cén cinneadh
lines.irish: It doesn’t matter what decision

lines.english: You just cumadh cé chomh [?]
lines.irish: You just came up with how [?]

lines.english: Tá tú chomh lán de chac
lines.irish: You're full of shite

lines.english: Cosúil le do cheannaireacht
lines.irish: Just like your leadership

lines.english: Go for a crack, some fellas from the lower whack
lines.irish: Go for a laugh, some lads from the poorer side

lines.english: When they see me, téann na láimhe ina bpoca
lines.irish: When they see me, hands go into their pockets

lines.english: Who's shouting yeah, cos I'm here to stroke ya
lines.irish: Who's cheering? I’m here to rob you

lines.english: Is maith liom na bróga sin, luadh couple of nóta
lines.irish: I like those shoes, a few notes were mentioned

lines.english: Seems they suit me, I'll take them home lad
lines.irish: They suit me grand, I’ll take them home, mate

lines.english: You backing up Badenoch? Cry into your sherry
lines.irish: You supporting Badenoch? Cry into your sherry

lines.english: Had enough Badenoch, you thought it's momentary
lines.irish: Fed up of Badenoch, thought it was a short spell

lines.english: Called your bluff Badenoch, Belfast to Derry shouting “Fuck Badenoch”
lines.irish: Called you out Badenoch, from Belfast to Derry they’re shouting “Fuck Badenoch”

lines.english: Nah, nah, nah
lines.irish: Ná, ná, ná

lines.english: Imithe le fada
lines.irish: Gone a long time

lines.english: It's Kneecap, the recap; Ríthe Bhéal Feirste
lines.irish: Seo Kneecap, an achoimre; Kings of Belfast

lines.english: Ar chrónaigh sibh Provaí, Móglaí Bap agus Mo Chara
lines.irish: You crowned Provaí, Móglaí Bap and Mo Chara

lines.english: Good effort, Kemi
lines.irish: Triail mhaith, Kemi

lines.english: Hard luck in the elections
lines.irish: Mí-ádh sna toghcháin

lines.english: Onwards and upwards
lines.irish: Ar aghaidh agus suas linn

lines.english: Free Palestine
lines.irish: Saoirse do Phalaistín
